sections.title: Product Intro
points: REST-ful API, JSON, as a single point of entry for common work-related applications
Consolidating all formats regularly used for work: e.g. Email, File Sharing, Calendar, Contacts...
Abstracting the popular integrations from different providers, e.g. all Google Suite, Outlook 365, Dropbox
Unified API logic: additional media forms and integrations easily added
High performance, enabling swift work processes

cards.title: Centralizing
points: "Single Point of Contact": Centralised resource for work integrations
"Integration Management": Access to (and maintenance of) the cloud applications taken care of

cards.title: Connecting
points: Connections between integrations are built in, enabling novel functionalities

cards.title: Unifying
points: One API logic for all relevant media formats and integrations

sections.title: Functionality through inter-connected tools
points: Simplified, unified and consistent work processes
Holistic search results across all sources
Consolidation within a media form, for example the central availability of contacts from different sources, or the integrated display of events from the different calendars
Connection of functionalities, for example attaching a file from Dropbox to an email from Outlook in a single step, or moving a file from Google Drive to One Drive

points.title: We stay out of your users' content
subpoints: No hosting of personal work content through Work-API
Work-API only holds the user's data and preferences for the Work-API account, as well as the credentials for the underlying APIs

points.title: We take security seriously
subpoints: Isolation of services, token storing only, no server-side caching
No plain text communication whatsoever: everything is encrypted

points.title: We even let you host our application
subpoints: Integrates with the client's preferred software, infrastructure and hosting solutions
